title: Portable Speakers, ZENBRE M4 Wireless Bluetooth Speakers for Laptop, Tablet, iPhone, Computer Speaker with Enhanced Bass Resonator (Blue)
feature: 【Light your bag, boost your music】Ultra mini design (6.9 x 4.7 x 4.7 cm,2.99 pounds) with a remarkable 3W / 2IN driver. Perfect fit to bedroom, as a private room-theater!
【Ultra-portable, Easy to Use】With cute and cylindrical design, it could be held tightly in the palm of your hand. It has only two buttons. Simple your life, make it more easy by turn on/off!
【Bluetooth 3.0 + EDR】Advanced Bluetooth tech offers an extended 33ft range, Connect Bluetooth device in seconds.

【Hands-free, Built-in microphone, USBcharge】Hands-free answering call supported by a built-in Mic. Ithas two ways to foster your musical enjoyment. Support to smartphones, tablets,laptops, Android, iOS, Windows and Eho Dot.
【Helpful feature】 If you have a small group meeting, if you want to watch movies by PC, if you want to have a small party at home, the sound is particularly sexy!
